com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.context.impl

Class SessionProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.AbstractProxy
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.DexMakerProxy
        • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.context.impl.SessionProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler

    public class SessionProxy
extends DexMakerProxy

    Proxy for a Session which intercepts Session method invocations. Successful "data-modifying" method invocations, such as Session.save(Object), Session.update(Object), and Session.delete(Object), will add a DataEvent to the EventPublisher queues, allowing them to react accordingly on qualifying lifecycle events.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 01/13/13
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
